hymn.title: O come let us sing unto the Lord

layout.singingstanza: O come let us sing un -- to the Lord; Let us make a joy -- ful noise To the rock of our sal -- va -- tion. O come let us sing un -- to the Lord; Let us make a joy -- ful noise To the rock of our sal -- va -- tion. Let us come be -- fore His pres -- ence With thanks -- giv -- ing, And make a joy -- ful noise un -- to Him with psalms. For the Lord is a great God, And a great King a -- bove all gods.

lyrics.stanza: Let us come before His presence With thanksgiving, And make a joyful noise unto Him with psalms. For the Lord is a great God, And a great King above all gods.
In His hand are the deep places of the earth. The strength of the hills is His also, The sea is His, and He made it, And His hands formed the dry land, And His hands formed the dry land.
O come, let us worship and bow down; Let us kneel before the Lord, our Maker. For He is our God, and we are The people of His pasture, And the sheep of His hand.
